# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="76aab-102">Lippude ja meeldetuletuste lisamine Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="76aab-103">Sündmuse meeldetuletuse määramiseks või redigeerimiseks tehke järgmist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="76aab-104">Avage [Kalender](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="76aab-105">Valige sündmus, millele soovite meelde tuletada, ja seejärel valige ülemises parempoolses nurgas olevad nooled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="76aab-106">laiendamiseks.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="76aab-107">Valige nupu **Meenuta mulle**kõrval meeldetuletuse aeg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="76aab-108">Outlook.com salvestab teie muudatused automaatselt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="76aab-109">Kui soovite sõnumi järeltegevuseks meelde tuletada, saate lisada Järeltegevuse lipu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="76aab-110">Ava [meilisõnum](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="76aab-111">Suvandi lipp kuvamiseks liikuge sõnumiloendis üle sõnumi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="76aab-112">Lipu ikooni valimine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="76aab-113">sõnumi lipuga märkimine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="76aab-114">Kõigi lipuga märgitud sõnumite kuvamiseks märkige lehe vasakus allnurgas olev ruut, et minna ülesannete juurde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="76aab-115">Lisateavet leiate teemast [lipu lugemine või sõnumi kinnitamine rakenduses Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76aab-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
